original_text: And another angel came out of the temple which is in heaven, he also having a sharp sickle.
korean_text: 또 다른 천사가 하늘에 있는 성전에서 나오는데 역시 예리한 낫을 가졌더라

sentences.original_text: And another angel came out of the temple
he also having a sharp sickle
sentences.korean_translation: 그 또한 날카로운 낫을 가지고 있었다
